About the Conference

100 Years of Stafford Beer

The ‘100 Years of Stafford Beer’ project will include the development of:

  • A video documentary: ‘A 100 Years of Stafford Beer: A documentary celebrating the visionary who fused science, art, and spirit to reimagine society’.
  • A Festschrift Book: An online edited book with contributions from invited authors to summarize Stafford’s legacy.
  • Metaphorum Journal Launch: ‘Organisational Systems’ - an online, open-source journal.

Who We Are Inviting

We welcome:

  • Relatives and collaborators who knew Stafford personally and will share insights into his life and character.
  • Researchers advancing his legacy by adapting his original thinking and developing innovative cybersystemic methodologies.
  • Consultants and practitioners who continue to evolve his theories through creative and impactful applications.

Conference Steering Committee

Pre-Conference Events

  • Session at ST&SP Conference: 24–26 March 2026.
  • Special Stream at ISSS: June 2026.
  • Special Stream at ASC (Brazil): 2-7 August 2026.
  • Special Stream at ORS (Nottingham): Sept 8th-10th 2026.
